CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Flash Newspicture Magazine, October 25, 1937, pg. 8, reads: "When Pittsburgh Goes in for an Evening's Rip-Roar, the Ritz Club supplies the fun and fast stepping entertainment. At the top are shown those who run this popular night spot and those who run the patrons a high temperature.  They are (left to right): Allen 'Crooner' Armstead, Miss Sarah Branon, author of 'Just Another Evening'; 'Shine' Dunlap, the rest of the partnership, and Miss Evelyn Camplin, who has a decided monopoly of rhythm... (Photos by Teeny Harris, Pitts., Pa.)
TitMainTitle: Allen "Crooner" Armstead, Sarah Branon, "Shine" Dunlap, and Evelyn Camplin, posed in Ritz Club
